Name: Country Code
Remarks: Q202 is the code identifying the country in which the ship (vessel) is registered.

Name: Date
Remarks: Q203 is the required pier date.

Name: Date
Remarks: Q204 is the date of departure of the vessel.

Name: Date
Remarks: Q205 is the date the shipment was unloaded from the vessel.

Name: Lading Quantity
Notes: Number of units (pieces) of the lading commodity

Name: Weight
Remarks: P070816: If either Q2-07, Q2-08 or Q2-16 are present, then the others are required

Name: Weight Qualifier
Notes: Code defining the type of weight

Name: Flight/Voyage Number
Notes: Identifying designator for the particular flight or voyage on which the cargo travels

Name: Reference Identification Qualifier
Remarks: C1011: If Q2-10 is present, then Q2-11 is required

Name: Reference Identification
Notes: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Name: Vessel Name
Notes: Name of ship as documented in "Lloyd's Register of Ships"

Name: Volume
Remarks: P1415: If either Q2-14 or Q2-15 is present, then the other is required
